tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: All Pediatric Problems ,Consultation provided for newborns ,
review: Dr Abhinav tiwari is very friendly and genuine person.My daughter is born in new Zealand and we recently arrived in India when she was 2.5 months old.Being new parents like everyone thinks we were also looking  for a reliable doctor for her further care and vaccination during our stay in india.Fortunately I came across him due to word of mouth and we are very happy for having found him.he is very polite and explains all your queries patiently and in detailed.Few weeks back my daughter was suffering from viral infection,it was late night and we were very tensed,in such circumstances Dr Abhinav was very cooperative and thankfully he was available on calls and text .he treated her immediately and gave us sigh of relief.I personally feel that we are in safe hands and would definitely recommend him for someone who are new parents and  looking for a trustworthy family doctor for their kids.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Abhinav is always very attentive to what the patients is sayingHis diagnosis has been spot on (so far so good) His medication is effective (so far so good) Always available(replies back to the queries) on what's app as well and on callI live almost 6 km(one hour travel at times)  away having a lot of  pediatricians available much closer, But still prefer Dr. Abhinav Need i say more Thanks Doc

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
A kid's doctor has to be as friendly and cheerful as a kid... *** ****** ** ** *** *** **** ************ I and my husband have come across for our son.. He's been helpful, informative, calm and friendly all at the same time.

He is very passionate about his profession and understand's the fears and confusion of new parents...his informative conversations replace the fear with confidence.

Thank you for being here whenever we needed advice and guidance.

Lots of love,
The Kehimkars

Dr listen and understand the parents about our child health and also make parents understand the problem and provide best solution and prescribed limited medicine and also available over call and whatsapp even in night or early morning. Thanks Dr. Abhinav Sir
